items.title: Transfers Ajax: Wijndal hoorde zelf niets over eventueel vertrek
items.summary: VI volgt het transfernieuws bij Ajax op de voet, zeker nu de winterse transferwindow in aantocht is. De doelwitten van de Amsterdammers, duiding van de clubwatcher, of aandacht in buitenlandse media. We verzamelen alles hier.

items.title: Regeer wil meegereisde Ajax-fans vergoeden na historische nederlaag in Alkmaar
items.summary: Youri Regeer zag hoe Ajax onthutsend zwak voor de dag kwam in de verloren Eurojackpot KNVB Bekerwedstrijd tegen AZ ( 6-0 ). Regeer wil de meegereisde fans vergoeden. 'Dit is niet Ajax-waardig.'

items.title: NWSLPA: 'Rodman rule' violates CBA, federal law
items.summary: The NWSL Players Association has filed a grievance against the league arguing that the NWSL's creation of the new "High Impact Player" mechanism violates the CBA terms.

items.title: Madrid dumped from Copa in Arbeloa's 1st game
items.summary: √Ålvaro Arbeloa got off to a dismal start as the new coach of Real Madrid, seeing his team lose to second-division club Albacete 3-2 and drop out of the Copa del Rey in the round of 16 on Wednesday.

items.title: Arsenal edge Chelsea despite Garnacho double
items.summary: Liam Rosenior's first home game as Chelsea manager ended in defeat as Arsenal edged a thrilling Carabao Cup semifinal first leg 3-2 at Stamford Bridge.

items.title: Karl helps Bayern best Pep's Bundesliga record
items.summary: Lennart Karl's fourth Bundesliga goal of a breakout season helped Bayern to a 3-1 win at Cologne in the Bundesliga on Wednesday.

items.title: Ajax likt de wonden na historische afgang: 'We zijn gewoon overklast door AZ'
items.summary: Davy Klaassen probeerde de vinger op de zere plek te leggen nadat Ajax door AZ op zeer pijnlijke wijze uit de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker gekegeld is . Nog nooit verloren de Amsterdammers met zulke grote cijfers van de club uit Alkmaar.

items.title: Dramatisch debuut Arbeloa: Albacete knikkert Real Madrid uit Copa del Rey
items.summary: √Ålvaro Arbeloa is zijn tijdperk als hoofdtrainer van Real Madrid dramatisch begonnen. De Koninklijke heeft gedag moeten zeggen tegen de Copa del Rey omdat het na een krankzinnige slotfase van Albacete verloor.

items.title: Nigeria v Morocco: Africa Cup of Nations semi-final goes to extra time ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Game goalless after 90 minutes; winner faces Senegal ‚öΩ Read Football Daily | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail Billy Morocco in their red and green, Nigeria in all white. Captains Hakimi and Osimhen exchange pennants and handshakes. It‚Äôs go time. The noise is something else. Nigeria‚Äôs national anthem is well observed. Morocco‚Äôs is raucous ‚Äì the stakes are huge. Kick-off is upon us. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: verlenging bij Nigeria tegen Marokko
items.summary: Marokko en Nigeria vechten uit wie het tegen Senegal opneemt in de finale van de Afrika Cup. FC Porto en Benfica staan tegenover elkaar in de Portugese beker.

items.title: Chelsea 2-3 Arsenal: Carabao Cup semi-final first leg ‚Äì live
items.summary: Arsenal took control of the semi-final despite two goals from the substitute Alejandro Garnacho Liam Rosenior‚Äôs pre-match thoughts I‚Äôve been lucky enough to be with the lads for six days now. We‚Äôve been very strong on what expect as a staff, what we expect as a group, and I hope to see that come out. [On the various injuries] Reece James took a knock on his hip and he‚Äôs not quite ready. Cole [Palmer] should he available for Saturday, Liam [Delap] and Jamie Gittens are ill, Malo [Gusto] will hopefully be fit for Saturday. [On the relevance of last year‚Äôs semi-final defeats to Newcastle and PSG] There are a lot of learnings from that journey. Every competition is different. Today we are in a different place to where we were a year ago. We are away from home; last year we started at home. We‚Äôre very excited, very motivated and willing to start again. [On coming up against Liam Rosenior] Every manager has his fingerprints. The players remain the same and they will have certain habits and qualities that they want to exploit on the pitch. They are a very strong team who we respect. Continue reading...

items.title: Arsenal edge Chelsea in frantic five-goal Carabao Cup semi-final first leg
items.summary: Arsenal will take a narrow advantage into the second leg of their Carabao Cup semi-final after a frantic 3-2 first-leg win at Chelsea.

items.title: Mane destroys Salah's Afcon dream again - will he get another chance?
items.summary: Mohamed Salah's Afcon dream was ended by Sadio Mane and Senegal on Wednesday night - but how many more chances will the Liverpool forward have to win the competition?

items.title: Atletico want Wolves' Gomes - Thursday's gossip
items.summary: Atletico Madrid want Wolves midfielder Joao Gomes, Everton and Nottingham Forest are keen on signing Youssef En-Nesyri, plus more.

items.title: Why did Man United, Chelsea, Real Madrid all sack their managers? It's about culture
items.summary: Why have three of the biggest soccer teams in the world fired their managers in the span of just 12 days? To clubs like Man United or Real Madrid, it's not about results, but how they fit.

items.title: Hearts show title credentials with more 10-man heroics to beat St Mirren
items.summary: Hearts overcame Beni Baningime's early red card to pull off a stunning 2-0 win over St Mirren and restore their six-point cushion at the top of the William Hill Premiership.

items.title: Nygren's goal secures crucial win for Celtic at Falkirk
items.summary: Celtic's resurgence under Martin O'Neill continued with an unconvincing but vital 1-0 win against a stubborn Falkirk in the Scottish Premiership.

items.title: Taylor banned from darts for six months after failed drugs test
items.summary: Dom Taylor has been banned from darts for six months by the Darts Regulation Authority (DRA) after testing positive for cocaine and cannabis at the World Darts Championship.

items.title: Sadio Man√© strikes to deny Salah‚Äôs Egypt and send Senegal to Afcon final
items.summary: Some day, perhaps, Mohamed Salah will get the better of Sadio Man√© in a major game, but not on Wednesday, not in the Africa Cup of Nations semi-final. When Senegal beat Egypt in a shootout in the 2021 Afcon final, Man√© scored the winning penalty before Salah had the chance to take his. In the shootout in the qualifying playoff for the 2022 World Cup, Salah missed his effort and Man√© scored the winning penalty. This time it didn‚Äôt get to penalties, but Man√© was still the match-winner, thrashing in the only goal with 12 minutes remaining. Continue reading...

items.title: Conor Gallagher vows to bring Tottenham ‚Äòspecial moments‚Äô after ¬£34.6m transfer
items.summary: Midfielder signs long-term deal after move from Atl√©tico Thomas Frank: ‚ÄòConor will bring leadership and maturity‚Äô Conor Gallagher has pledged to bring ‚Äúspecial moments‚Äù to Tottenham after completing a ¬£34.6m transfer from Atl√©tico Madrid. Spurs moved quickly for a midfielder they have long admired after losing Rodrigo Bentancur to a hamstring injury at Bournemouth last Wednesday, beating off competition from Aston Villa. Bentancur has since undergone surgery. Tottenham looked at Gallagher at the end of the 2023-24 season only for him to go from Chelsea to Atl√©tico for ¬£34m. Before the Premier League game between Chelsea and Spurs in May 2024 at Stamford Bridge, the home fans unfurled a banner of Gallagher. ‚ÄúChelsea since birth,‚Äù read the caption about their academy product. The subtext was clear: do not sell him to Tottenham. Continue reading...
